backend/main.mo: Main canister logic managing access control, user profiles, and model/trade-related types with automatic user registration and role checks.
backend/migration.mo: Defines OldTrade and NewTrade structures and provides migration logic for upgrading stored trade data, including new tag fields and blob-based images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, and test IDs for enhanced trade notes and screenshot blob storage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing authentication state, page navigation, and conditional display of the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/CustomToolManage: Dialog component for creating, editing, reordering, and deleting custom trading tools with dynamic fields and option handling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Reusable React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a fallback UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with a copyright notice and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the main app header with navigation, theme toggle, and user auth controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Provides a landing and login screen with feature descriptions and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/ModelBuilder.tsx: Implements a full model creation and editing interface with ICT tool configurations and custom tool management.
frontend/src/components/ModelCardSummary: Shows a summary dialog of a model’s tools with concise property extraction and save/back actions.
frontend/src/components/ModelWizard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a future model creation wizard.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile by entering a name and saving it via backend mutation.
Allows users to select observed tools, computes adherence against saved models, and returns qualifying model matches.
frontend/src/components/ToolConfigDialog: A large dialog component for editing tool configurations, providing dynamic property editors based on tool type and predefined option sets.
frontend/src/components/trade/BracketOut: UI control for selecting a bracket’s closure outcome via preset buttons.
frontend/src/components/trade/EmojiMulti: Emoji-based mood selector allowing single-choice selection for trade journaling.
frontend/src/components/trade/ManualClos: Numeric input field for entering a manual close price with validation.
frontend/src/components/trade/TradeImage: Image upload and preview component allowing adding and removing trade screenshots.
frontend/src/components/trade/TradeOutco: Editor for completing trade outcomes, managing bracket outcomes, notes, mood, images, and validation before saving.
frontend/src/components/TradeDetailDialo: Dialog wrapping TradeOutcomeEditor, handling save logic and displaying trade outcome details.
frontend/src/components/TradeForm.tsx: Comprehensive trade creation/edit form with model selection, position sizing, validation, and scenario calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating models, trades, and other backend data through an actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines custom CSS variables plus responsive layout rules for trade-related UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Analytics.tsx: Renders an analytics dashboard that filters trades and computes various performance metrics, distributions, and visualizations.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays a high-level trading dashboard with performance stats, equity curve, recent trades, and top model summaries.
frontend/src/pages/Models.tsx: Displays and manages trading models, including create, edit, and delete actions with a builder dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Trades.tsx: Lists, filters, sorts, and manages trades with support for creating, editing, viewing, outcomes, and model-based preloading.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/adherence.t: Computes adherence-based filters and performance metrics, including comparisons between high- and low-adherence trades.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/brackets.ts: Calculates bracket-level performance metrics such as TP/SL hit rates and average R for each bracket index.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/distributio: Generates histogram bins from R values using equal-width binning.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/equityCurve: Builds cumulative equity curves from completed trades and computes maximum drawdown.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/htfBias.ts: Infers HTF bias from model tools and groups trades to compute bias-specific performance metrics.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/metrics.ts: Computes overall performance metrics including win rate, PL, R, profit factor, and averages.
Runs Monte Carlo simulations using empirical R values to project equity paths and summarize results.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/sessionAnal: Assigns trades to trading sessions and computes session-level win rate, PL, and R metrics.
frontend/src/utils/analytics/timeBuckets: Computes hourly and weekday trade metrics including counts, win rate, and P/L for completed trades.
Calculates performance impact metrics for each tool type by comparing tool-specific results to overall trade baselines.
Infers trading session from timestamps and filters trades by model, session, and adherence score.
Buckets trades by volatility based on stop‑loss distance and computes win rate, P/L, and R metrics per bucket.
frontend/src/utils/setupIdentifier/adher: Maps observed tools to model conditions and computes adherence scores based on checked conditions.
frontend/src/utils/trade/outcomeMath.ts: Derives closure prices and calculates trade P/L, percentage return, and R:R from bracket outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/trade/outcomeModel.ts: Maps bracket outcome edit state to persisted format and back for manual or predefined closure types.
frontend/src/utils/trade/reflectionModel: Extracts and merges reflection fields such as notes, mood, images, and review flags into trades.
frontend/src/utils/trade/tradeMetrics.ts: Computes total P/L, R:R ratio, and winner/loser status from completed trade outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended components, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file defining versioning, system summary, architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and pending analytics- and UI-related feature requests.
